Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Drive out the dark beings from Cultists' Refuge.

Kill all {@LinkCreature:489#3603#mercenary berserkers}, {@LinkCreature:489#3604#mercenary mystics}, {@LinkCreature:489#3605#mercenary reavers}, {@LinkCreature:489#3606#mercenary archers}, {@LinkCreature:489#3701#mercenary lancers}, {@LinkCreature:489#3702#mercenary sorcerers}, and {@LinkCreature:489#3703#mercenary slayers}.

Report to Raubelak when mission is complete.
Great job. Please continue to help the federation eradicate the cultists.
We will not retreat until the forces of darkness are completely eradicated.
